participant_1.background:
I'm always trying to find new ways to make our home feel more like our own.
I like movies that make me feel something, whether it's happy, sad, scared, or anything in between.
I like to analyze my friends' behavior and try to understand their motivations.
I'm not sure if I'm a healthy person, but I'm trying my best to live a healthy lifestyle.
I love my parents very much and am grateful for all they have done for me.

participant_2.background:
I dress in a way that is fun and reflects my personality.
i am married and have five children.
I wish my grandpa could tell me more about his time in the service.
i still like unicorns even though i m an adult.
i drive a big truck.

content.text: Good! I'm just hanging out with my kids.
I love kids! How many do you have?
Wow, that's a lot! I'm sure they keep you busy!
They do! But they're also a lot of fun.
What are your favorite things to do with them?
We like to go to the park, play games, and read books.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm glad you have such a great family.
What's your favorite thing about being a parent?
I love seeing the world through their eyes. They're so innocent and curious about everything.
That sounds really sweet. I'm sure your kids are lucky to have you as their mom.
What's your favorite thing about your family?
I love the sense of togetherness that we have. We're always there for each other, no matter what.
That sounds like a really great family. I'm glad you have that.
